name: My Robo Nanny
description:
Hello, WB51! You were created to help people! So many families need you. You should keep house clean, babies calm, and yourself charged! It might sound difficult, but that's why you're a robot. Good luck with your tasks and don't hurt kids!

Here are developers of Robo Nanny, give them praise:

Game designers: Oleg_Bone, satacat, nomersol

Artists: nomersol, satacat, Oleg_Bone

The Coder: rekkorize

Controls:

  • Left/Right Arrows – to move
  • Up Arrow – to jump
  • E – to interact

Credit: Pixel Keyboard Keys by Dream Mix

The game was made as a submission for Ludum Dare 51
